title: Healthians -Full Body Checkup
description:
Healthians is one of the leading names in at-home Diagnostic Test, Scan Tests & Doctor Consultation in India, employing cutting-edge technology to deliver fast and accurate reports at affordable prices. Present in more than 250 cities across India, Healthians is one of the country’s fastest-growing lab tests and healthcare providers with a focus on preventive health. 
 
Health Services Offered:
- Blood Tests like Full Body Checkups, Diabetes Test, Pregnancy Checkups, Thyroid Diagnostics Tests, Preventive Packages etc.
- Scan Tests such as ECG, X-ray, Ultrasound, MRI, CT Scan etc.
- Get Online Doctor Consultation and Dietitian Consultation starting at Rs.129
- Buy Ayurvedic Health Supplements for Immunity, Nutrition, Weight Loss, etc.
- Surgery from Registration, Transportation, Admission, Insurance etc.
 
Diagnostic Test at Home
- Book Full Body Checkup, Preventive Health Test, Blood Test, Health Screening & regular Health checkups at convenient & affordable process. Along with the Blood Test Packages, we also provide health tips & articles by doctors & nutritionists. Free Home sample collection and report counselling is also provided.
 
Scan Tests
- Book Radiology tests like X-ray, Ultrasound, ECG, MRI, CT Scan, Dexa, Mammography etc. from home and visit the Scan or Radiology labs to get the checkup done. Get additional discount on online payment of Scan booking.
 
Consult Doctor Online
- Get Doctor Consultation across 20+ Specialties like Gynecology, Child Specialist, General Physician, Dietitian etc.
- Up to 100% Cashback on Doctor Consultation Offer for a limited period. TNC applicable.
- Get detailed prescription of medicine, tests and suggestions from experienced doctors and dietitians.
 
Surgery Solutions
- Healthians also provides hassle-free end-to-end surgery solutions via its flagship program, Healthians Care.
- From minor to life-saving surgeries, we’ve got you covered every sf the way, from the booking and transportation to admission formalities and insurance paperwork. 
 
What you get
💰 Value for money for your health test & Full Body checkup packages
🆓 Free home sample collection of lab tests
💳 Pay online or at the time of sample collection using cash, card or digital wallet
🙂 Painless experience
💯 100% accurate results from NABL compliant labs
⏲️ Smart Reports within 24 hours
👨‍⚕️ Free Report Consultation
 
Now, booking Blood test, Full Body Checkup or a Health Screening & tracking your health status is just a click away using the Healthians - Health Diagnostics & Online Doctor Consultation Check Up app. Healthians provides health and medical checkups in 250+ cities across India. So, next time you need health tests in Mumbai, Pune, Bengaluru, Delhi, Gurugram, or Hyderabad do not forget to try Healthians as your trusted health tests partner.
 
Awards and Recognition
🏆Innovative Startup in Diagnostic Healthcare 2017- The Indian Startup Conventions 2017
🏆Healthcare Innovator Enterprise Of The Year- Leaders Award 2016
🏆Young Entrepreneur of the Year - Annual Entrepreneur India Awards 2016
🏆Health & Social care enterprise of the year award -Leader’s Award 2015
🏆Health Beauty & Wellness eRetailer of the year- Indian eRetail Awards 2015
 
To stay tuned about Healthians.com exciting offers & latest happenings follow us on:
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/Healthians/
Twitter - https://twitter.com/healthians
Support Us
If you like our app, please support us by rating us on the play store.
